text: Bug Adventure is an educational video game about bugs by Knowledge Adventure. It was first released in 1994. ==Description== Bug Adventure is an educational video game, released for DOS and Macintosh in 1994, and Windows in 2015. The interactive nature almanac and encyclopedia presents facts and media related to bugs (e.g., insects and spiders). It also includes a quiz game. == References == Category:1994 video games Category:DOS games Category:Educational video games Category:Mac OS games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Educational video game stubs Category:Children's educational video games
title: Bug Adventure
